_header: As the sea doth ebb and flow / So fareth the world
Title(s): ‘Lerne say wele say litel or say noȝt’
Subjects: precepts; abuses of the age; flatterers, against
_description: ‘Lerne say wele say litel or say noȝt’ — thirty-one 8-line stanzas

BodDig102.First Lines:
As þe see doþ ebbe & floweso fareþ þe world
                    hyder & þeder…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…Be goddis childre in charyteAs god doþ in the gospell
                    say
BodDig102.Attributed Title: Lerne say wele say litel or say noȝt (f. 101v)
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 14-22.
